name: Mom, I Started A Cult
description:
The day after the supposed apocalypse of 21st December 2012, you decided to start a new doomsday cult. A crude simulation anyway in this game.

This game has all these features:

  •  Buy upgrades to get more followers
  • Bask in the might of your new cult (at least in terms of numbers on the screen)
  • Expand to new cities (Well, three of them)
  • Two kind of crap sound effects
  • Uses HTML5 oooohhh

A game for Lundum Dare 46
